cards.flavor_text: [i]Flat-topped sky islands were highly valued by Rabbitfolk and humans alike, as they provided the most arable land, the easiest land to construct cities on, and the land with the best vantage points.[/i]
[i]Leoro Hill acted as both power generator and reservoir, capturing the heavy rains of the Great Winding River as it periodically wandered overhead.[/i]

[i]The region unofficially known as Bile Gyre consisted of clouds of toxic gases vented from the core mixed with water vapor and decaying organic matter, interrupted only by the floating ruins of the mighty cities that predated the Cataclysm.[/i]
[i]​The ancient magical cataclysm resulted in erratic gravity differentials that fueled volcanism and regularly erupted new sky islands millennia later.[/i]

[i]The day-night cycle of the plane had not been disrupted, so the great jungles and woodlands survived as they dispersed. Borne upon wild winds, seeds scattered to far lands to mix with other trees, creating wondrous new hybrids.[/i]

[/b]{W}{U} SEIZE THE CORE Seize Vryn itself. Gain a steady stream of energy. And play tempo cards to level the playing field.
{B}{U} COVERT CONSORTIUM Hit your opponents with sneaky creatures to uncover your opponents doom.
{B}{R} VEHICLE MAVERICKS Run over your opponent with Vehicles and use crewing creatures as cannon fodder.
{R}{G} ENERGIZED KICKER Accumulate energy and spend it to kick your spells into overdrive.
{G}{W} TEACH ABILITIES Modify your creatures with ability counters. Attack with big creatures.
{W}{B} PHYREXIAN ENTER THE BATTLEFIELD Reanimate and flicker your creatures to bury your opponent under a pile of value.
{U}{R} WIZARDS FROM EXILE Rebound is back. Combine it with impulse effects and other cast from exile synergies to show your spellcasting domination.
{G}{B} LEAVE THE GRAVE Make your cards leave the graveyard and get reward for it.
{R}{W} INSPIRED GEARS Attack your opponent with inspired creatures and double up on your value by cracking some gears.
{U}{G} ENGROSS FLASH Cast versatile spells during your opponents turn and disrupt them with counter-magic and spells with flash.
